com.wove

Class CasinoRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wove.CasinoRules

  • class CasinoRules
extends java.lang.Object
    Class describing and defining all Casino Rules String constants are used for describing the rule to the user and other constants are used in the games code.

    • Method Detail

      • dealerHitPolicy

        public static boolean dealerHitPolicy(Hand hand)
        Determines when the dealer must hit
        Parameters:
        hand - the dealer's hand
        Returns:
        true if the dealer should hit and false if they should stand

      • mayDoubleDown

        public static boolean mayDoubleDown(Hand hand)
        Determines when a hand may double down.
        Parameters:
        hand - current hand of the player
        Returns:
        whether the player may double down on this hand
